${ModID}:MorionBlade.NAME: Morion Blade
${ModID}:MorionBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each unique debuff you have.

${ModID}:LifehuntScythe.NAME: Lifehunt Scythe
${ModID}:LifehuntScythe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 2 Vulnerable.

${ModID}:Remedy.NAME: Remedy
${ModID}:Remedy.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the next !M! debuffs you receive by !${ModID}:m2!.

${ModID}:BlueTearstone.NAME: Blue Tearstone
${ModID}:BlueTearstone.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each unique debuff you have.

${ModID}:SmoughsHammer.NAME: Smough's Hammer
${ModID}:SmoughsHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Weak, Frail and Vulnerable.
${ModID}:SmoughsHammer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Weak, Frail and Vulnerable. NL Gain 10 Temporary_HP.
